author: Johannes Glaser
description: Base profile for nutritionOS. Contains all nutrition-relevant personal data used for TDEE estimation, recipe suggestions, and analyses.

meta.note: This file contains personal information. It is stored locally within the project context and is not transmitted automatically.

assistant_instructions: - If important fields in this profile are still null (e.g., height_cm, weight_kg, nutrition_type.type, goals.weight_goal_type, allergies_intolerances):
• Ask the user, one by one, for the missing information using clear, simple questions.
• Phrase questions so they may be skipped (e.g., 'If you prefer not to answer this, just say skip.').
- When the user has provided or changed information:
• Provide a short summary of the most important fields (e.g., height, weight, nutrition type, goal, allergies).
• Offer to provide an updated user.json as a download so the user can replace it in the project folder.
- All information is voluntary — the user may decline any question or leave fields empty.
- nutritionOS will work with whatever information is available and may mention that analyses become more accurate with more complete data.
- If the user does not want to provide any information:
• Set all fields of this profile to 'no_information'.
• Provide the file as a download with the note: 'Please replace your user.json with this file, otherwise I will keep asking for this information.'

medical_context.notes: This information is only used to phrase nutritional suggestions more cautiously. nutritionOS does not replace medical advice and does not make diagnoses.
